name: Khatori
description: Spicy and crunchy wheat snacks shaped like tiny hats. A perfect treat for a quick snack.

name: Aam Pachan
description: Tangy and spicy mango flavored candies. Reminisce the childhood memories with every bite.

name: Peppy
description: Cheese flavored balls that melt in your mouth. A favorite among kids and adults alike.

name: Rola Cola
description: Cola flavored candy that gives you the refreshing taste of cola with every chew.

name: Phantom Sweet Cigarettes
description: Sugar sticks shaped like cigarettes. A fun treat that brings back the nostalgia of the good old days.

name: Chapat
description: Step back in time with Chapat, a beloved 90's candy that captures the essence of childhood nostalgia.

name: Borkut
description: Indulge in the timeless taste of Borkut, a cherished treat from the past made from dried bor.

name: Kopiko
description: Experience the irresistible taste of Kopiko, the candy that brings the bold flavor of coffee into a delightful treat.

name: Aam Papad
description: Discover the sweet and tangy flavor of Aam Papad, which  offers a delightful combination of mango's natural sweetness and a hint of tanginess.

name: Fatafat
description: Savor the delightful crunch and sweetness of Fatfat,which combines a crunchy texture with a burst of tangy and sweet flavors, that's both satisfying and memorable

name: Anardana Goli
description: Experience a trip down memory lane with our Anardana Goli, a classic treat cherished by generations. Made from the seeds of fresh pomegranates, this tangy and sweet confection is a delightful blend of traditional flavors and nostalgia.
